articles.author: Brian Fung
articles.title: TikTok could face EU fines and a suspension over sister app TikTok Lite - CNN
articles.description: European officials are threatening TikTok with massive fines and a possible forced suspension this week of parts of a new spinoff app, launched this month, that regulators allege contains addictive features.
articles.content: European officials are threatening TikTok with massive fines and a possible forced suspension this week of parts of a new spinoff app, launched this month, that regulators allege contains addictive f… [+3569 chars]

articles.author: Rezaul H Laskar
articles.title: EU eases multiple-entry Schengen visa regime for frequent travellers in India - Hindustan Times
articles.description: EU ambassador Hervé Delphin announced the adoption of specific rules on issuing multiple-entry visas to Indian nationals by the European Commission | Latest News India
articles.content: NEW DELHI: The European Union (EU) has adopted new visa rules that will allow frequent travellers from India to apply for multiple-entry Schengen visas with longer validity, easing travel to 29 Europ… [+2523 chars]
